website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality table with plenty of happy, comfortable customers.
cons: Lacks the accessories and extra features of other models

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I'm struggling with this review because I'm highly disappointed in more than one thing about the table. First of all, do not show your customers a "Made in America" hype video when it's clearly marked Made In China. That alone is false advertising. I'm not sure why this table is more expensive than the other Earthlite tables? I expected the padding to be plush, but it feels like a normal table and the plastic head rest holder is cheaply made. The Hammacher Schlemmer table I had for 15 years was sturdier than this one. I'd really like to hear back from the manufacturer. I feel stuck with this product now since I threw out the Packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey F. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Quality of material - poor, filling - poor
customer_reviews.text: No longer a reliable brand. I'd been buying their products for years. This table was purchased by many of my clients and the quality is currently just not the same. Quality of material - poor, filling - poor. The quality of all their products in general has unfortunately diminished. The reason I'm reviewing this table is because I've seen much less expensive tables out there that are just as good if not better.
customer_reviews.author: jasper

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My husband decided we needed to get a real massage table to work on achy shoulders and backs. This was a fantastic choice. Height is easy to adjust. Table is super padded. Easy to clean. Quick to set up and take down. Hubby is a big guy and he feels comfortable getting onto table and is not afraid of it tipping or collapsing. We use a bath sheet (super-sized towel) rather than bed sheets to drape the table. Would recommend getting a pad for the face/head rest.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Burgess

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: it's everything I needed and wanted as a replacement table. it's comfortable, durable, and clients love it. HOWEVER ... they need to change weight description. IT IS NOT 34 lbs. IT IS NOT LITE. It's heavy!!!! I'd say about 50-55 lbs. That's a pretty pig different in weight. I was also worried about the legs only have 1 leg fastener.... but it truly works and is very stable. invest in a carrier with wheels if you travel a lot. Also the pegs on the side where the patients arms lay sometimes jab into the skin. So few minor things, but overall it's an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but broke at handle attachment site with first patient use
customer_reviews.text: I received my table last night and used it on my first patient today and it broke! I've requested an exchange, and that is being handled. I'd love to give this 5 stars, as my patient said the table was very comfortable for him, but I do have a concern with it breaking upon first use. I'm hoping to give this a higher rating after I get my new table and am able to use it with more patients. The foam cushioning did feel very comfortable and the headrest was comfortable as well. I like the ability to change the angle of the headrest as well.
customer_reviews.author: KMP

customer_reviews.title: Love EarthLite
customer_reviews.text: I am a massage therapy student and this is the second table I purchased through Amazon. The first one (Sierra Comfort) is also a good table, but not wide enough for people to feel comfortable. EarthLite made their table at 34 inches (I was hoping to find 36") but this was the best bang for the buck. I spent some time on my own table recently and I found it was well cushioned, wide enough for my arms and sturdy enough that it never faltered. I am happy to use this on my current guinea pig and it will turn into my practice table once I pass my boards.
customer_reviews.author: ChellyBean

customer_reviews.title: I’ve bought 5 of these! So bummed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought 2 for myself and had 3 clients order for there homes. I’m really embarrassed that all 5 tables squeak and crack. I charge good money for my work and they have to listen to crackling the whole time. I have 2 older tables from earthlite, my first table from 1996 and it’s still amazing and perfect, then one from 2002 and the material completely has shredded and falls all over the place. Not sure what’s going on but the quality of there tables just goes downhill over the years! I can’t refer this table to clients unfortunately, And I can’t figure out how to stop the noise. It truly sucks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Clark’s

customer_reviews.title: Love this massage table!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a new masseuse that decided to try out Earthlite based on a friends recommendation, and I'm super glad that I did. I can't believe how comfortable it is to lay on. I fell asleep in seconds the first time I laid on it. I love how efficiently it breaks down, it's overall weight, sturdy durability, and that it makes no noise at all when even my heaviest client moves around.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I had full replacements of both knees last year and cannot kneel to get on the floor to exercise. This table allows me to continue with all the exercises I've learned in physical therapy. Excellent quality allows me to confidently exercise. It is one of the more expensive than others, but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Harriet

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the burgundy and loved it more that I thought I would.
customer_reviews.text: I had an old table that was given to me from my previous school. It has been over 12 years since then, so I decided to order the same brand. I just received my new table today and it is exactly what I wanted and expected it to be. It incredibly comfortable. I am used to my old table so I guess I can say it is light enough to carry around. The table comes with its own bag, but no bolster (which I wish it did, but oh well). It is easy to set up and very sturdy. When storing it is also easy to fold back up.
customer_reviews.author: Mona M.

customer_reviews.title: Customer service earns 5+ stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been using an EarthLite table for more than 20 years, first as a massage therapist and now as a traveling physical therapist. I have relied on the quality of the product for my clients comfort and safety. I recently purchased a new table and carrying bag, both of which did not live up to the standards I have come to expect - AND - Paul in the customer service department responded to my emails within 12 hours, and sent replacement products. The replacements are of higher quality and on par with what I am used to from EarthLite. Thank you for the superb customer service, and for holding your product standards higher than the rest.
customer_reviews.author: renee c.

customer_reviews.title: Made to last!
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy with this table. I’m an Acupuncturist and I get a serious amount of use on these tables. I have a oakworks table that has held up great for about 8 years and I needed to get rid of a different one. I tried buying one of the cheap versions on Amazon and it fell apart in a month. So I decided to try Earthlite and am soooo happy I did. It feels amazing. The color is gorgeous (maroon) and is very wide and sturdy. You can tell it’s made to last!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Llama

customer_reviews.title: VERY dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have bought at least 3 Earthlite massage chairs and 3 tables over the course of my 20 years as a bodyworker. I have loved them all UNTIL this table. After about 2 weeks of moderate use, it's making all kinds of creaking noises in the wood frame. Can't figure out from where. I thought it might work itself out as the table settled so I didn't return it. Plus returning a massage table is a huge hassle. This will bet he last product I buy from Earthlite. I have a bunch of Oakworks equipment as well. None of it has ever done this. And one table is the one I went to school with 20 years ago!
customer_reviews.author: lara a minichiello

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table that doesn't squeak while being used. It has adjustable heights and a carrying case....although I'm not sure how far my wife would be able to carry it if doing a house call because it is still fairly heavy. BUT she would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Travis W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table
customer_reviews.text: This table is used twice a week by a member of my family for medical massage. It is very similar to the table the massage therapist was bringing to our home, & it has worked very well. This same family member uses it regularly for exercises she has received from her physical therapy sessions, & it has been excellent for this as well. One person can set it up easily, & it stores easily when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: CKoza

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier. As a professional LMT I always expect the best when it comes to Earthlite and this table falls right in line with that expectation. Solid, sturdy, easy to set up, well packaged, comes with a travel bag made with strong material, clients think it's great.....I should expect to be able to use this as my portable travel table for some time to come and the price pointing was a bonus (my only regret was that I didn't jump on it when it was priced even lower a few weeks before which would have been even more amazing).
customer_reviews.author: MitchRider2014

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table!!
customer_reviews.text: I have given several massages on this table as well as received and it is wonderful! Easy to set up, easy for me to put in and out of my trunk, and the face rest and padding is so relaxing. I bought the flannel sheets and the fleece table warmer and all together this is as fabulous as others had said. This is for my home use or to bring to friends houses, so the ease of carrying was as important to me as the comfort. It is also very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Katie F

customer_reviews.title: Buy this massage table! It’s amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! Very comfy and you can tell it’s quality! I take massage classes and I like this one better than a lot of people’s for its comfort, sturdiness, quality, and it’s so easy to use! Comfy enough to sleep on as a bed!
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Blakeman

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The description was very accurate, The quality is great, it’s super easy to put up and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Randi Chargualaf

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best and most durable table for a masseuse on the market. Don't buy cheap versions. It will end up costing you more.
customer_reviews.author: BigHawk

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This table has been great! Easy to set up and take down. Very comfortable! The bag it comes with makes it easier to travel with and it had a larger outer pocket that you can fit sheets or the face cradle in. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Newman

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic offering from Earthlite
customer_reviews.text: This table has been in use for a number of years now and it continues to be a joy to use. the covering has shown almost no visible wear and the clasps and bag have held up very very well. The adjustable legs make it really easy to dial it in to the users height and take the strain off the back of having to bend over to reach the person your working on. With its impressive weight capacity it is rock solid and when you push it doesn't give at all. Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Grimrivet

customer_reviews.title: Good but overall
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Used 13 times. One client was a masseuse and said it was comfy. Headrest is a bit flimsy but holding up so far. Easy to transport with case, even for me at 4’11”. I wish it was just a few inches wider though or came with external arm supports. Bigger clients have no place to lay arms.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Babula

customer_reviews.title: Great for in home massages.
customer_reviews.text: This table is one of the best investments I've made. My wife and I use it a couple of times a week and its sturdy and easy to setup. Adjusting the table height is important since I am about 10 inches taller than my wife. The quality is excellent and storage is very simple with it folded up. I also like the adjustable headrest which can be positioned for comfort. The case it comes in has both a shoulder strap and handles for easy carrying around.
customer_reviews.author: IBALD

customer_reviews.title: Decent table for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had several massage tables in the past. This one seems to keep its shape, the quality is pretty good and its easy to transport w/out seeming too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Doheny

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Table was awesome at first, comfortable and all of my clients loved it. Then out of nowhere the framing broke when one of my clients sat down, not a heavy client either. I don't know why it happened but I'm really unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Florescu

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for client and healer
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband to use in his healing practice. He says that it works great for him. I have even had the chance to get my husband to let me use it in my Reiki Practice, it is a great table. Clients that have had sessions with him and with me, all say that it is comfortable and they feel safe on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Being used for professional message therapist. More money than others but worth it. The sheep skin like cover is a must for the table
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ash

customer_reviews.title: Exellent bargain table!
customer_reviews.text: This is really well made. I've had it for about a month now. Mostly for use in my home office but also for a couple of housecalls. It's lighter than my other table and folds together easily. The case is made of a flat vinyl material that zips up into a case. It's not actually a bag. A little funky at first but now it seems easier to use than the usual bag style. I have a lot of big guy clients so the 30" in width is perfect. Clients have said it feel much more comfortable than my old table as well. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cutter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Massage Table
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect, quality solution for in-home or even portable light professional use. The table is sturdy and comfortable, made in America with quality wood and components. It is a little more money than some of the other offerings, but it is worth it. Upon research, we decided that the piano hinge is an absolute must instead of other tables without that feature. If you want comfort, and long term durability, this is a great choice. We recommend getting the fitted sheet set that is available for this table. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for some at-home massage work we're having performed. I set it up and laid down on it. Then I woke up a few hours later. So, to this massage newbie, it's very comfortable. It's also super easy to set up. You just "open" it. After actually using it several times, it shows no signs of having any trouble spots.
customer_reviews.author: CraigG

customer_reviews.title: Quality, sturdy, strong and comfortably design furnishings ed
customer_reviews.text: As a professional New York State Licensed Massage Therapist I came to love the Earthlite brand, I have purchased many products from this company ( 3 tables,1 massage chair, 2 bolsters, table warmer... ) I always recommended their brand cause I find it to be of good quality. My clients and peers have made purchases off of my recommendation. Delivery was slow, packaging was good and once opened it was what I expected. Great quality, sturdy and strong furnishings that is guaranteed to give me my monies worth such as my previous orders did. Thank you Amazon & Earthlite
customer_reviews.author: Kwamé

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I got this table. It is a little heavy, but well worth it. It folds up nicely, it comes with a carrying bag (so helpful). I love that you can adjust the height. It is a little tricky to fold back up. The cables need to work in unison to close. All in all a great table.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny DuShane

customer_reviews.title: It's okay..
customer_reviews.text: Only one set of screws per leg... not as secure as other brands... worried about it breaking
customer_reviews.author: Elusive Beach Babe

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this purchase. Easy to stabilize, looks good, sturdy and comfortable enough.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Bates Brown

customer_reviews.title: Brand new table broke
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this massage table a few months ago. Today while working on a client the middle section of the table broke. I was extremely fortunate that my client did not fall off the table. With that said, this massage table is essential to my business and clients are scheduled. I’m very disappointed and would like a refund. I do not see a way to contact seller
customer_reviews.author: Kahla Gueno

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bern using it for 3 months in my office. It works well. Myclients think it's comfortable. My only complaint is that one of the extensions/ hinges that allows the leg to bend squeaks when my knee hits it. Just haven't called the company on it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Patti McQuinn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality, comfort
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality, comfort, and...smell. Yes, all the sense. The smell when you first open a product tells you a lot. It smells of wood - not something plastic and toxic. Great product and worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: P. Everitt

customer_reviews.title: Great Table!
customer_reviews.text: Great table! I purchased this table as I was going to school to be a LMT. Great quality, sturdy, comfortable. Beautiful overall. It is on the heavy side and is difficult to transport to on location massages. Comes with a nice travel bag!
customer_reviews.author: Mcgruff

customer_reviews.title: great table
customer_reviews.text: I've used earthlite tables for a while and this is one of the very sturdy products
customer_reviews.author: Andriy  Chetin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable .
customer_reviews.text: Durable. A little heavy though. Bust lasted 2 years already.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette Z.

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner table
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time that I bought this table First time was in 2003 which lasted me a long time, unfortunately I sold it. Now I am a little disappointed about the quality of the new one. The wood definitely is of less quality then it used to be, cushioning is ok. Carrying bag pretty cheaply made! Don't get me wrong, it still is a good table for the massages I am doing and a good starter table, not so much if you plan to do lots of house calls/out calls. Would I buy it again? Sure ... but not if I would have more money to spend on a lighter table.
customer_reviews.author: Siggy

customer_reviews.title: Well made - comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and fairly light for it's size and condition. As it is well made it's not super light but certainly light enough to carry from car to office/place of use. Folds down really well and has a good carry case. Height adjustable legs make it easy for people of any size to use. Laying on the bed is comfortable and the included face hole makes laying face down easy.
customer_reviews.author: Limey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy table for at-home use. Carrying case is easy to use. Wide enough for 6’0 200 lbs. The craftsmanship is excellent, very minimal noise, no squeaking. I had to purchase arm rests and other accessories separately but easy to find on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MAS

customer_reviews.title: this is a solid table and a good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Essentially, this is a solid table and a good value for the money. It is comfortable, roomy enough for large clients, and easy to set up and adjust. I have two beefs. The first is the plastic face cradle. It fits poorly in the holes and seems a bit flimsy although comfortable. The second is a small indentation where the two halves of the table hinge together. It's not significant, and no one has complained, but I can feel it when I pass my hand over it.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Benaron

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: I love the table. It is very sturdy andstable.... as stable as a massage table should be. It does move when I'm giving an intense sports massage, which it is SUPPOSED to do.Very comfortable The only problem I have with this table is that it squeaks when I am doing the intense massage.......which can be fixed when I decide to oil it.
customer_reviews.author: Cris Compton

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and comfortable. My wife and I use ours quite a bit (not as often as we should!) and it's been a good purchase for us. The head rest sits a little high, I wish we could make it a bit lower, but it's overall quite nice. The carrying/storage bag is nice, too, with a pocket you can put a sheet, oil, etc. inside.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Armbrust

customer_reviews.title: Solid Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is solidly built and comfortable. I got this for my wife as a birthday gift. Actually, her gift is a massage every night before bed so the table is for me. It makes our nightly massage routine easy. Everything about it is exceptional. Nice leather. It sets up in no time. Although I wasn’t looking for portability, it couldn’t be better for that. I could fold it up and have it in my car in less than a minute. My greater concern was strength and comfort. The head/face holder is comfortable, very strong and easy to adjust. You could easily massage a 300 Lb. person vigorously without a wobble. This is definitely worth your consideration.
customer_reviews.author: scratchmybrain

customer_reviews.title: So perfect! Very soft and so easy to adjust every ...
customer_reviews.text: So perfect! Very soft and so easy to adjust every part of this bed. From adjust the legs, to head rest and collapsing/unfolding the bed.
customer_reviews.author: KARYL HARPER

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy So Far
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy so far, the bed came a day early then expected, so extremely happy about that, very soft, it did have a small scratch on it but pleased with it so far
customer_reviews.author: T.A.

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret making this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a slimming machine for myself and decided to use it on others as well. I purchased this table and I’m so glad I did. It’s comfortable and firm. My clients are happy!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Padilla

customer_reviews.title: LMT Apprentice
customer_reviews.text: This massage table is amazing! Easy to assemble/fold up. Shipping was uber quick and EARTHLITE makes a quality table. I was referred to these by my massage teacher. My family is so spoiled now that we have a table at home for me to practice on them!
customer_reviews.author: Garner Family

customer_reviews.title: it cracked underneath the whole thing broke
customer_reviews.text: the massage table cracked and broke underneath. It is made out of thin wood that looks like what they use for balsa wood airplanes.
customer_reviews.author: jewels

customer_reviews.title: Averageish
customer_reviews.text: Probably going to return this. Very hard table, needs topper. But sturdy and easy to move. Not what i expected at this price point
customer_reviews.author: dariali

customer_reviews.title: This is a very comfortable facial and body massage table
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable facial and body massage table. It is sturdy and I am pleased with my purchase. I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: My Reiki table
customer_reviews.text: I shopped on [...] for same table and they stated they had cheapest prices. I eventually checked product manufacturer and still yet found it cheaper here on Amazon. I received it in great new condition and almost a week early. It's seriously easy to put up. I'm only 5"1' and carrying it in travel bag is a task, but not impossible. I'd recommend anyone buy it if they've done their research for what works best for their needs. Lying on it is comfy as the padding is thick.
customer_reviews.author: CoRonaSue

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so completely satisfied! This table is exactly what I had dreamed of and hoped for! Well worth the price!!!! It is so comfortable and also easy to set up and light weight! ♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: People are always so impressed with this table! Every time I pull it out, people comment on what a nice table it is
customer_reviews.author: krystle B.

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to receive this table and to find that it lived up to the description of the item. The table is comfortable, sturdy, stable, easy to open and close, and well-built. As a new Reiki practitioner who only provides sessions for family and friends and who has no intent of opening up a business, the convenience of having the table come with its own storage/travel bag just makes the purchase all the better. I would recommend it to anyone looking for their first table.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: This table is very comfortable and sturdy. I plan on getting a great deal of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable table.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table & very comfortable. I don't have it long, but I hope it lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: MKH

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, construction and stability!
customer_reviews.text: This table is constructed well. There are no squeaks or rattles and everything is tight and strong. I'm 5'11" at 175lbs and I can maneuver confidently around or on the table. If you or your client are much taller than that, you may have some issues fitting on. The upholstery is stretched perfectly smooth. Setting up and breaking down the table is easy enough but is a bit on the heavy side, especially when trying to get it in the carrying tote. I agree with other reviews about the face rest feeling somewhat flimsy but it still works fine and I've had no problems with it. Great price for a great portable table.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal table, worth every penny! It is very sturdy and breaks down as compactly as can be expected. It is a little on the heavy side but it surpassed my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: A&TSnodster

customer_reviews.title: but once opened it was so easy to set up (like one step) and it feels ...
customer_reviews.text: This table is REALLY well-made. I'm a small person so it was a little heavier than expected in the box, but once opened it was so easy to set up (like one step) and it feels so sturdy and the leather is so nice. Comes with the headrest and carrying case. Definitely worth buying if you're looking for a massage table.
customer_reviews.author: Chaya Yanko

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable table with the softest face cradle ever! Clients love how cozy it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Most pleased. 30 years ago paid twice as much for the same quality table. Lovin' this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ron M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing table
customer_reviews.text: 4 years old and still going strong!! I take meticulous care of my table and it looks brand new! Easy to use, and this whole set was a fantastic deal.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela M. Phan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Can actually carry around due to light weight. Seems really well made. Comfy enough to fall asleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Starlight

customer_reviews.title: This was a great choice for my first table
customer_reviews.text: I am a student of massage therapy. This was a great choice for my first table.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Schultz

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my purchase. I have numerous patients/day using the table and after a year it is still sturdy and looks new!
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid, great value, buy now!
customer_reviews.text: I own 4 of these for my tattoo parlor. They are used every single day, and are solid as a rock. They have a good height adjustment, and we have not to date had a client that this table couldn’t support. If I need another I will definitely get another.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan B.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and will hold up for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: This table is very nice and an upgrade from the one I'm replacing. I really like it a lot for it's style and support to make client feel comfortable on the massage table.
customer_reviews.author: Davirgi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and soft
customer_reviews.text: Recieved My Table today super super excited. Can't wait to put my first client on it material feels amazing. Width of table awesome i can see my clients not having to wonder where to put their arms anymore. Im very happy with the visual quality and im sure the working quality will be 👍 also.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Negron

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Table! The Wood legs are Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table so far! Although I wish this had wheels to help me tote or move it from one place to the next. Fits in the back of my suv perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Bama Mom

customer_reviews.title: Wow! This is a A+ Quality Massage Table for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I am a massage therapist student and we have to get a table to practice on. So, I did my research and chose Earthlite. Believe the good reviews on this table because they are True! OMG, I cannot say enough about this table, it is SO awesome. Set up was a snap, it was so easy a child could do it. The head rest is smooth as butter to put in and adjust. The construction is great. The padding is very sturdy and comfortable. My husband is 6'3, 240 lbs and he said he felt very secure and comfortable on it. I highly recommend this table!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: The table is comfortable and it’s lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The table is comfortable and it’s lightweight. The travel bag is oversized so it doesn’t fit well. If the travel bag was about 3 inches smaller it would fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy
customer_reviews.text: it's really solid. I weight 250 and can hop right on it with no flex or bounce. The quality is good on the frame. The headrest adjust works well, but its plastic. It's a hassle to carry it around, but what can you do about that?
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Quality table
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have nothing negative to say about this table. This is a very well built, high quality table, that is the same as you would find in a nice spa.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Crowell

customer_reviews.title: Only attribute that would make this table better is if it were made in a country supporting ...
customer_reviews.text: Only attribute that would make this table better is if it were made in a country supporting workers rights and better environmental stewardship. Otherwise the product itself is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS TABLE. Sturdy ! Wide! Soft and not too heavy! It’s a great table
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gandy

customer_reviews.title: I use this for work and it is not too ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work and it is not too heavy to carry around but durable for any client.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla S.

customer_reviews.title: superior
customer_reviews.text: The reviews on other tables were very helpful in selecting this masse table. I didn't want a squeaky, wobbly table so i purchased the table with best reviews. Thank you to all the up and coming massage therapists who had the insight and experience to share. This is a very sturdy and gorgeous table.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: I love my table
customer_reviews.text: I love my table! It's super light to carry and the pocket in the carry case fits all with the exception of a stool. All of my clients have said it's one of the most if not THE most comfortable table!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Very comfortable for my clients and lighter than my old table.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Physick

customer_reviews.title: Well made and durable
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, durable and comfortable. Purchased this for myself to do stretches on. Beats getting up off of the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headrest fitting poor.
customer_reviews.text: The head rest is not a snug fit into the table. It is always loose. If you are over 6ft tall this table does not adjust high enough to keep you from constantly being in a bent back position while giving a massage.
customer_reviews.author: nic

customer_reviews.title: This is a great table for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table for the money! Vergy sturdy, I do Reiki, but feel it would be fine as a massage table
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!! And eco friendly! What’s not to love
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We don’t use it for traveling much but it is easy setup and breakdown at home!
customer_reviews.author: Hails/Zabalza

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and price.  Would buy again in a second.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly packaged. Excellent quality, which I expected from Earthlite. Not a cheap top as you see on less expensive tables. Padding is cozy and inviting. Clients and students love it! Bag is not flimsy - great if you're going to carry the table around.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce G

customer_reviews.title: Quality product,  Eco-friendly.  Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good buy. The table has great stability and is very comfortable. Leg length can be adjusted to raise or lower the table, and the head rest is also adjustable. Also included is an arm sling which allows the person on the table to have their arms hang down below the head. A high quality canvas like carrying case with a heavy duty zipper and shoulder strap round out the deal which I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Table for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I paid under $300.00 with my Prime account included shipping, and was so impressed with the quality of this table. It is easy to set up and my clients rave how comfortable it is. It is a little heavier than I would have liked for an out call business but with a table cart it makes it easier to get from place to place.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Holmes

customer_reviews.title: So noisy
customer_reviews.text: This table is so noisy and I want to return it so badly! Never had a table make so much noise.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife. Nice and sturdy construction. Folds and unfolds easily. Well thought out design and should last for a long time. The travel bag fits nicely and makes carrying a cinch.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great table.
customer_reviews.text: This massage table is great. Sturdy and I like that it is simple to adjust legs. I can give a massage or use it to exercise and it is steady. I will be careful when moving just in case the legs don't move together as it is a little heavy for me alone.
customer_reviews.author: Chessnut

customer_reviews.title: Great for private clients
customer_reviews.text: This is a really sturdy table, easy to transport and set up, and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Yates

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: It’s everything you need. Easy to set up, comfortable to lie on - even for a man.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: I use this for my work. It is stable ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my work. It is stable and comfy. I matched up a stool and bolster with the color. No problems
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Jill Gallaher

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this table. Sets up instantly. Face-rest is super adjustable. Folds up more compactly than I had envisioned. Super sturdy, even when I'm working deep tissue. Highly recommend a heating pad and half-bolster, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: Victoria
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great however, the 2 clasp at the end of the table are fragile. My table came with a broken clasp although the shipping box had no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: A super comfortable, very solid table that both my masseuse and I love.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

product_meta.title: EARTHLITE Portable Massage Table HARMONY DX – Foldable Physiotherapy/Treatment/Stretching Table, Eco-Friendly Design, Hard Maple, Superior Comfort incl. Face Cradle & Carry Case (30" x 73")
feature_bullets: ALL-IN-ONE MASSAGE TABLE: Table, patented Deluxe Adjustable Facecradle with proprietary Cloudfill poly-gel blend facecradle cushion and durable nylon carry case. Table folds easily and transports easily in its rugged nylon carry case, weighs 38lbs.

SUPERIOR COMFORT: Full sized 30” x 73” table fits people of all sizes, adjustable height range 23-33". Hand upholstered with 2.5” of soft dual density cushioning that you won’t bottom outon. The Natursoft fabric is durable yet soft and supple to the touch
PATENTED FACE CRADLE: The massage table packages includes a deluxe adjustable head rest with a proprietary Cloudfill poly-gel blend face cradle cushion for a perfectly positioned &comfortable client.

PROFESSIONAL QUALITY FEATURES: This table was designed for years of professional use and also features non-slip stable feet, sure-grip knobs, full length piano hinge for strength & attractive dual maple outlets and a heavy duty, single pocket carry case

MADE BY THE WORLD’S MOST TRUSTED BRAND IN MASSAGE: Founded in 1987,Earthlite is world’s largest & most trusted massage supplier. LIFETIME LIMITED WARRANTY: Lifetime warranty on frame & construction, 3 year warranty on the foam & upholstery, CE Mark
